description: Detects the execution of rundll32 with a command line that doesn't contain a .dll file Author: Tim Shelton, Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Application Executed Non-Executable Extension
query: (process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe AND (NOT ((NOT _exists_:process.command_line) OR (process.command_line:*.dll* OR process.command_line:"") OR (process.parent.executable:*\:\\Program\ Files\\Internet\ Explorer\\iexplore.exe AND process.command_line:*.cpl*))))
